title: Benefits of studying MBBS in Nepal
text: The course structure of the MBBS program offered in Nepal is mostly similar to that of India, and that is why many students opt for studying here. The program fee for MBBS in Nepal is extremely budget-friendly, and many institutions also give students an option for paying the fees in installments.

title: Career Options after MBBS in Nepal
text: Nepal is renowned for its breathtaking landscapes, including the majestic Himalayas, lush green valleys, and serene lakes. Studying in Nepal offers the opportunity to immerse yourself in nature and explore some of the world's most stunning destinations.

title: Natural Beauty
text: From majestic mountains and pristine beaches to lush forests and sparkling lakes, New Zealand boasts some of the most breathtaking landscapes in the world. Students have the opportunity to explore its natural wonders and enjoy outdoor activities such as hiking, skiing, and surfing.
